query.mssql: create table {0} ([ReportSessionId] varchar(256) not null, [LineNumber] int not null, [DocumentDate] nvarchar(max) null, [RegNumber] nvarchar(max) null, [Isp] nvarchar(max) null, [BussinesUnit] nvarchar(max) null, [TypeCorrespondent] nvarchar(max) null, [Correspondent] nvarchar(max) null, [Content] nvarchar(max) null, [Status] nvarchar(max) null, [Executors] nvarchar(max) null, [Controllers] nvarchar(max) null, [Term] nvarchar(max) null, [DocumentID] bigint not null, [TaskID] bigint not null, [ParentsTaskID] bigint null, [HyperlinkDocumentID] varchar(256), [HyperlinkTaskID] varchar(256), [HyperlinkParentsTaskID] varchar(256))

query.default: select LineNumber, DocumentDate, RegNumber, Isp, BussinesUnit, TypeCorrespondent, Correspondent, Content, Status, Executors, Controllers, Term, DocumentID, TaskID, ParentsTaskID, HyperlinkDocumentID, HyperlinkTaskID, HyperlinkParentsTaskID from lenspec_Reports_ExecutionOrders where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId order by LineNumber;
